title: Support Main needed for Ranked 5 Team
body:
Hello,

QUICKFIRE Academy is looking for a Support Main who will want to be apart of a Team environment.

Our Team is currently Bronze 1, looking to reach Plat + Tournaments. 

Requirements to Join:

**Teamspeak **and a **MIC**, this is an absolute must!. ~ (And Don't Worry, We're an extremely laid-back bunch of people)
Gold - Silver ~ (Our team is Mainly Gold/Silvers, but plats are welcome)
Must be able to play in the afternoons/nights ~ (Atleast the very minimum Friday-Saturday nights)

Little information about me,

I'm the Current ADC for QUICKFIRE Academy. 
22 years old. (Oldest in the team ...)
Gold 5
Been playing League of Legends non-stop since season 3


If you would like to Join QUICKFIRE Academy, just send me an ADD in-game and I'll see ya soon ! {{champion:429}} 

Note~ Not everyone on the team will be able to play due to School/Work. (But i'm online all day every day)

replies.body: Thresh main here, lvl 7. 110k mastery points. In game name is MaximumWifeSteal, currently in silver 5. Play 7 days a week from 3:30-9:30 weekdays and all day weekends. AEST
Count me in man, I typically play adc but can play support, I'll add you in game when I'm home from work :)
Also, this is a ranked 5's team not dynamic queue though we may do dynamic on occasion
